extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: This plugin check to see whether users can access to an article. Only publish it if you use OS Membership Articles Restriction Settings plugin to restrict access for subscribers

field.name: redirect_url
field.label: Redirect URL
field.description: URL of the page users will be redirected to when they are not allowed to access to the articles. You should put the url of the subscription plans page on your site into this param
